patthana15.52:1.1: Noupādānaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādāno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana15.52:2.1: Upādānaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādāno naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.52:3.1: Nokilesaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
